diff_hunk:
@@ -1113,25 +1113,53 @@
   name: all
   types:
     - Byte
+  variants:
+    - method
   backends:
     - CPU
     - CUDA
-  cname: logicalall
-  return: bool
-  arguments:
-    - THTensor* self
+  options:
+    - cname: logicalAndAll
+      return: bool
body: one thing I noticed from this (and this isn't an issue with your PR), is that in ATen we are actually returning bools from this function but we should be returning Tensors, to match the other reduction functions.
